entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy or a few thunderstorms beginning early this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
